content: winter dreamer headband ©2024 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com email kalurah@whiletheyplay com for pattern support sales of finished garment is allowed reproduction of pattern or use of my photos is prohibited without written permission pattern notes stitch guide this headband is worked holding a strand of bulky weight 1/3 rc - slip 3 sts to cn hold to back k1 k3 from cn yarn with a strand of sequin thread this results in incredible 1/3 lc - slip 1 st to cn hold to front k3 k1 from cn stitch definition and a shimmery glow worked in a unique kfb - knit into the front of the stitch do not drop stitch cable that creates a stretchy fabric allowing it to be worn from needle knit into the back of the same stitch drop orig- by a wider range of head sizes pattern is written in one inal stitch from lh needle 1 st increased to 2 sts size see below all repeats appear in bold text throughout pattern the pattern is charted and also includes separate video links written instructions 1/3 rc http //bit ly/1over3rc 1/3 lc http //bit ly/1over3lc yarn yarns shown are biches & bûches le coton & alpaca in grey brown 66% gots cotton & 34% super fine al- row-for-row written instructions paca 98 yards/90 m per 50 g /1 76 oz held together with king cole cosmos in galactica 76% glitter yarn 24% pattern payette 429 yards/393 m per 25 g/ 88 oz note hold both yarns together throughout entire headband yardage note yardage needed does not include a gauge swatch with smaller needle co 80 using longtail cast on join in 90 yards/82 meters the round and place bor marker needles ribbing us 5 3 75 mm 16 circular needle rounds 1-4 k1 p1 x 40 us 7 4 5 mm 16 circular needle work should measure 1 /2 5 cm from co notions switch to larger needle cable needle increase round k1 kfb k1 p1 x 20 100 sts stitch marker for bor tapestry needle chart rounds blocking materials round 1 and all odd-numbered rounds k4 p1 x 20 round 2 1/3 rc p1 1/3 lc p1 x 10 gauge round 4 repeat round 1 cable pattern worked in the round on larger needle blocked round 6 repeat round 2 21 stitches & 20 rounds = 4 /10 cm x 4 /10 cm round 8 repeat round 1 round 10 repeat round 1 finished measurements laying flat blocked round 12 1/3 lc p1 1/3 rc p1 x 10 circumference 19 /48 cm round 14 repeat round 1 height 4 5 /11 cm round 16 repeat round 12 stitches/abbreviations switch to smaller needle * - repeat what is shown after decrease round k1 p1 k2tog p1 ssk p1 k1 p1 x 10 - repeat what is shown between 80 sts bor - beginning of round cn - cable needle ribbing co - cast on rounds 1 & 2 k1
